content:
From: Anders Schlichtkrull <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
Dear Isabelle Users List

We are again looking to appoint a number of assistant professors (with possibility of tenure-track), associate professors and full professors in computer science.
You can apply for both the Copenhagen campus and Aalborg campus of Aalborg University.

The deadlines for applications are soon!

I work as assistant professor (tenure-track) at the Copenhagen Campus, and I hope that someone from the Isabelle mailing list will be my new colleague! :-D
From the ITP community we have here also Jonathan Julian Huerta y Munive and LÃ©on Gondelmans who you may also know.

You can apply here:

Full professor, Copenhagen or Aalborg, deadline 1st February: https://www.vacancies.aau.dk/scientific-positions/show-vacancy/vacancyId/1216825
Associate professor, Copenhagen or Aalborg, deadline 15th February: https://www.vacancies.aau.dk/scientific-positions/show-vacancy/vacancyId/1216940
Assistant professor with possibility of tenure track, Copenhagen or Aalborg, deadline 15th February: https://www.vacancies.aau.dk/scientific-positions/show-vacancy/vacancyId/1217131

Cheers,
Anders Schlichtkrull
